text: hi all, after searching for few hours through documentation and community posts, I am ending up asking for some help here. I am quite new in building templates using cms and i am trying to simply add a 5th property in the Buyer Company information ( a custom property for VAT ID). I have a custom theme and am working with the modern.html and figured out I can add the field in the modules in the theme but i can't get it to work..
